The thing with VolnArmor unlocks are the first unlock brings the level of effectiveness way up. Same with IthzirArmor. A lot of items are built in GS where the last unlock is where the real power comes into play. But for these, the first unlock offers a lot more power than the base.

So can we get more unlocks? Definitely. It's just an approvals game.

Riend
Sunday, October 22nd, 2017, 3:09:33 AM

@darconas There's always heavy restrictions on what armors/weapons you can add mechanically enhancments too. HCP/HDP and +40 usually being the ceiling. The higher end Voln armors came from RTCF where the script was added to 10x armors w/padding and/or TD.

You also cannot put the voln script on fusion gear. You'll not see 10x HCP gear getting the script if they offered it.
